name: Tap (ALB5000)
description:
In this little game, you have to manage 4 mini-games at once. The goal is to survive 1 minutes.

Controls : mouse click.

Top-Left Mini-game : click on the cube to change his gravity and escape the devil Arrow.

Top-Right Mini-game : click on the line to change his color and have the same color as the Arrow.

Bottom-Left Mini-game : click on the rounds which randomly spawn, if you let them go, they will change color and you lose when they become red.

Bottom-Right Mini-game: click on the red circles which spawn, Don't let them touch the big blue circle.

Made in one day.
